channel.title: [Hyperion] DevianX [Alpha]
channel.description: [center]Hello everybody! It's me Rene and Canownueasy here! We're working hard to redevelop the server in a very efficient and smooth manner. [b]Tech[/b] [i]For all you computer-interested folks out there![/i] [u]Attributes[/u] Our attributes system was made to prevent unorganized variables clogging up entity-extension objects. It's fast, reliable, and easy to use! Our first type of attributes system can replace boolean variables. It's an attribute tag system that is constructed with an array list-iteration of a String. We can easily add/remove temporary attributes that store data with the more advanced attributes system. This system can replace int(integer) variables. Constructed with a hash map-interaction of String for the attribute key, and Integer for the attribute value it's a simple solution to storing data that we can serialize to a player's game file. These attributes save thousands of pages in memory and used the right way lead to a more organized server! [u]Plugins[/u] We have setup many plugin systems all around the server. From teleportation plugins, to projectile based spell plugins, the plugins are simple abstract classes that serve as interfaces for a true-plugin. A true-plugin has pre-made data and few construction arguments making content-development far more elegant. The plugin system is based around the OOP (object-oriented programming) style, where there are many branches off other objects. [b]Game Dev[/b] [i]If you like game development media, check this out![/i] Melee preview [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/combatpre.gif[/img] [img]http://www.devianx.com/pictures/2.png[/img] [img]http://www.devianx.com/pictures/3.png[/img] [img]http://www.devianx.com/pictures/4.png[/img] [img]http://www.devianx.com/pictures/5.png[/img] [img]http://www.devianx.com/pictures/6.png[/img] [b]Web Dev[/b] [i]Like classy web development? This section's for you![/i] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/controlcentre-home.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/controlcentre-manage.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/controlcentre-login.png[/img] [b]Quotes[/b] [i]What are others saying?[/i] : "Far better programmed than any server I've seen in a LONG time." : "noice"

item.title: [Hyperion] DevianX [Alpha]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:11, topic:370841”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=466933.msg3416493#msg3416493 date=1291124320]

[quote author=Rixxx link=topic=466933.msg3415304#msg3415304 date=1290996240]

[quote author=Rene eats waffl3z link=topic=466933.msg3414484#msg3414484 date=1290945101]
Plugins
We have setup many plugin systems all around the server. From teleportation plugins, to projectile based spell plugins, the plugins are simple abstract classes that serve as interfaces for a true-plugin. A true-plugin has pre-made data and few construction arguments making content-development far more elegant. The plugin system is based around the OOP (object-oriented programming) style, where there are many branches off other objects.[/quote]
Hahaha, whoever typed this out is an idiot. What the fuck is “pre-made data” and “construction arguments”? How does its being there in a true-plugin make “content-development far more elegant”? Last sentence didn’t even make sense.

Good luck anyway.

p/s: I laughed at the quotes.
[/quote]Pre-made data in the construction arguments. Because our plugins inherit the plugin systems.
Content-development is far more elegant because you do not need to keep making new instances for things that are always going to be used. And the last sentence did make a lot of sense, it’s based around the OOP style, where objects inherit others. Instead of the kind of moronic programming you would do that is not considered OOP.
[/quote]Words cannot express how dumb you are.[/quote]
Its funny how moparscape people get mad over shit that doesn’t matter lol

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] DevianX [Alpha]
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:10, topic:370841”]Pre-made data in the construction arguments. Because our plugins inherit the plugin systems.
Content-development is far more elegant because you do not need to keep making new instances for things that are always going to be used. And the last sentence did make a lot of sense, it’s based around the OOP style, where objects inherit others. Instead of the kind of moronic programming you would do that is not considered OOP.[/quote]
I am starting to think that you’re a huge idiot. You can’t even get terminologies right. What you call “pre-made data” is actually partial implementation from whatever class your “true-plugin” is implementing or extending. Also, what instances are you talking about when you say “making new instances for things that are always going to be used”? Object-oriented programming is not just about inheritance. Please actually learn what you say to prevent yourself from looking like an imbecile. You are unquestionably a misled simpleton.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] DevianX [Alpha]
item.dc:creator: @Rene_eats_waffl3z Rene eats waffl3z
item.description:
@Rene_eats_waffl3z wrote:

[center]Hello everybody!

It’s me Rene and Canownueasy here! We’re working hard to redevelop the server in a very efficient and smooth manner.

Tech
For all you computer-interested folks out there!

Attributes
Our attributes system was made to prevent unorganized variables clogging up entity-extension objects. It’s fast, reliable, and easy to use! Our first type of attributes system can replace boolean variables. It’s an attribute tag system that is constructed with an array list-iteration of a String. We can easily add/remove temporary attributes that store data with the more advanced attributes system. This system can replace int(integer) variables. Constructed with a hash map-interaction of String for the attribute key, and Integer for the attribute value it’s a simple solution to storing data that we can serialize to a player’s game file. These attributes save thousands of pages in memory and used the right way lead to a more organized server!

Plugins
We have setup many plugin systems all around the server. From teleportation plugins, to projectile based spell plugins, the plugins are simple abstract classes that serve as interfaces for a true-plugin. A true-plugin has pre-made data and few construction arguments making content-development far more elegant. The plugin system is based around the OOP (object-oriented programming) style, where there are many branches off other objects.

Game Dev
If you like game development media, check this out!

Melee preview





Web Dev
Like classy web development? This section’s for you!



Quotes
What are others saying?

: “Far better programmed than any server I’ve seen in a LONG time.”
: “noice”

Read full topic
